greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Rencontres numbers: permutations with exactly 8 fixed points.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 8..200
mathematica: With[{nn=40}, Drop[CoefficientList[Series[Exp[-x]/(1 - x) x^8/8!, {x, 0, nn}], x]Range[0, nn]!, 8]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 19 2014 *)
results.author: _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 25 2007
ext: Changed offset from 0 to 8 by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 19 2014
